mapper.select: select * from award where award_no = #{value} order by award_date desc;
select *, DATE_FORMAT(award_date, '%Y') AS year, DATE_FORMAT(award_date, '%c') AS month from award order by award_date desc;
select distinct DATE_FORMAT(award_date, '%Y') AS year from award order by award_date desc;
select distinct DATE_FORMAT(award_date, '%Y') AS year, DATE_FORMAT(award_date, '%c') AS month from award order by award_date desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO award (award_no, img_url, award_date, content, host) VALUE(NEXTVAL(award_seq),#{imgUrl},#{awardDate},#{content}, #{host} )
